text: Work, look for peace and calm in work: you will find it nowhere else.
author: Dmitri Mendeleev

text: Diplomacy in general does not resolve conflicts. Wars end not due to peace processes, but due to one side giving up.
author: Daniel Pipes

text: No one can find inner peace except by working, not in a self- centered way, but for the whole human family.
author: Peace Pilgrim

text: I too hope in this short reign to be a man of peace.
author: Pope Benedict XVI

text: If you are kept in ignorance of the true way and permit yourself to rely upon and be guided by the opinion of imperfect man, you can never gain the riches that will bring you peace and lasting happiness.
author: Joseph Franklin Rutherford
